feature: Create reminder for all students and send now
preconditions: School has a default channel configured and at least one active student
testSteps: Open Notifications. Click Add Reminder. Choose All Students. Select a template. Confirm message. Click Send Now.
expectedResult: Messages are dispatched immediately using the school channel. Delivery status is shown. An entry appears in Past.

feature: Create reminder for specific students and schedule
preconditions: At least two active students exist
testSteps: Open Notifications. Click Add Reminder. Choose Specific Students and select two students. Select a template. Set a future date and time. Click Create.
expectedResult: A row appears in Upcoming with correct student count, template, date, and time. No messages are sent yet.

feature: Deliver at scheduled time with correct timezone
preconditions: Reminder is scheduled for a future time in the school timezone and targeted students have valid channel details
expectedResult: Messages are delivered within the service window. Timestamps reflect the school timezone. The entry moves to Past.

preconditions: School channel is set to SMS or WhatsApp or Email
testSteps: Create a reminder and send now.
expectedResult: Messages are sent only via the configured channel. The audit log shows the channel used.

preconditions: Template contains variables such as student_name and cta_section
testSteps: Create a reminder using the template. Preview the message. Send the reminder.
expectedResult: Variables are resolved for each student. No raw placeholders appear in delivered messages.

testSteps: Attempt to schedule a reminder with a date and time in the past. Click Create.
expectedResult: A clear validation error is shown and the reminder is not created.

preconditions: At least one selected student is marked do not contact
testSteps: Create a reminder targeting that student and others. Send now or schedule.
expectedResult: The opted out student is skipped with a visible reason. All other eligible students receive the message.

feature: Permissions to create and send reminders
preconditions: Teacher role with read only permissions and Admin role with full permissions exist
testSteps: Log in as Teacher and attempt to add a reminder or send now. Log in as Admin and perform the same actions.
expectedResult: Teacher is blocked with a permission error. Admin is allowed to create and send.

feature: Surface failed messages and allow single retry
preconditions: Provider failure is induced for one recipient
testSteps: Send a reminder. Open Failed Messages. Click Retry for the failed item.
expectedResult: Failure is visible with a reason. A successful retry moves the item to Past. If retry fails, the reason is updated.

feature: CTA or deep link opens the intended flow
preconditions: Template includes a deep link to an Addie workflow
testSteps: Deliver the message. As the student, open the link.
expectedResult: The student lands in the intended Addie flow. The event is tracked to the notification identifier.

preconditions: One reminder is scheduled and another is sent now
testSteps: Send one reminder now. Wait for the scheduled reminder to fire.
expectedResult: Both reminders appear in Past with correct timestamps and final statuses. The scheduled row is removed from Upcoming.
